text: On a side note; I am currently working on a little investigation project about morphing sequences. I was wondering if you'd know what kind of approach one would take in TV animation for a character morph (e.g. Bruce to Hulk, man to werewolf, etc.) as well as a morph similar to this: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c9pJJcK9G44> ? I am assuming that in feature films you can take however long you want to get the result with VFX, but I'm not sure what you would do on tight schedules :thinking_face:

attachments.title: 2D Morphing Animation
